HairStyles.Style Description: A fancy style to do to your short hair or long hair. Using hair products will help you train your hair into a curl pattern to hold these styles.
A fancy style to do to your short hair or long hair. Using hair products will help you train your hair into a curl pattern to hold these styles.
The generic afro style. Simply comb / pick your hair out to achieve this.
The generic afro style. Simply comb / pick your hair out to achieve this.
A protective hair style that can last long when taken care of properly by wearing durags. Also helps promote hair growth.
A protective hair style that can last long when taken care of properly by wearing durags. Also helps promote hair growth.
Waves are obtained through the training of brushing your hair in a circular motion. The use of hair products and a durag / wave cap helps keep the style in place and holds the style.
Waves are obtained through the training of brushing your hair in a circular motion. The use of hair products and a durag / wave cap helps keep the style in place and holds the style.

Two Strand Twists are worn as a fashion style and a protective hair style. Using hair products helps hold the twists and place and they last as a style as long as they're taken care of properly and promotes hair growth.

Two Strand Twists are worn as a fashion style and a protective hair style. Using hair products helps hold the twists and place and they last as a style as long as they're taken care of properly and promotes hair growth.
An afro type style formed from unraveling two and three strand twists. Can be preserved to last several days if wrapping it up properly every night, and sometime retwisting.
An afro type style formed from unraveling two and three strand twists. Can be preserved to last several days if wrapping it up properly every night, and sometime retwisting.
